name: Vampire Bites Giraffe!
description:
Vampire bites Giraffe!

Eat all the hearts you can! ❣️

Vampire is flying along tremendous neck of the Giraffe! Drink from hearts  as match as you can!

Design 🧛

All game spites are made by AkaiTV(@AkaiTV)

Audio 🎵

Sounds & Music are made by Yegor(@Gogen)

Afterwords

I will be glad to read any advices or hints!

Contact me for any reason, glad to talk!

The game was made in the name of Halloween spirit!🎃

Thank you 💖
